Reviews.Title: Wrong item
Reviews.Author: ritebuy
Reviews.Content: They will ship a U20I, that is all that this company stocks. Which is a good phone but not the US model. You need the U20A for US 3G.

ProductInfo.Features:
Android 2.1
2.6 Inches QVGA Touch Screen Display with Slide-Out QWERTY
5 MP Camera with 4x Zoom and Face/Smile Detection
UMTS-HSPA 850/900/2100, GSM-GPRS/EDGE 850/900/1800/1900
Multiple E-mail Support (Webmail and ActiveSync), Internet and Wi-Fi Capable, Bluetooth 2.1
5.0-MP camera/camcorder; Wi-Fi networking; Bluetooth stereo music; GPS navigation; microSD expansion
Ultra-compact Android 2.1-powered smartphone with 2.55-inch touchscreen and slide-out full QWERTY keyboard
Unlocked quad-band GSM cell phone with US/International 3G plus GPRS/EDGE connectivity (not compatible with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint)
Up to 3.5 hours of talk time, up to 360 hours (15 days) of standby time; released in June, 2010
What's in the Box: handset, rechargeable battery, USB/wall charger, USB cable, wired stereo headset, quick start guide
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson U20a Xperia Mini Pro Unlocked Phone--U.S. Warranty (Pearl White)
